channel.title: Community Update - Late July '19
channel.description:
For the past couple of weeks, the MESG Foundation has been gearing up for the upcoming launch of Workflows through new releases, updates, and new content. Read on to learn about what we have been up to:

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/bi-weekly-news-31-07-19/
